General.Name: Peloton Minerals Corporation
General.Description: Peloton Minerals Corporation, a mineral exploration company, acquires and explores for mineral properties in Canada and the United States. It primarily explores for gold, silver, and copper deposits. The company principally owns three gold exploration projects located in Elko County, Nevada; and one gold exploration project in Montana, the United States. It also owns copper porphyry exploration project in Montana, the United States. The company was formerly known as Montana Gold Mining Company Inc. and changed its name to Peloton Minerals Corporation in 2016. Peloton Minerals Corporation was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in London, Canada.
General.Address: Tower B, London, ON, Canada, N6A 5B5
